subject: Doh--the state department knows?
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_13a_2b77_d79
Content-Type: text/plain; format=flowed

Maybe they think I'm an illegal alien!?


We Get ToTake This Whore--United--Stated-Gets---Purple--(now hear "this 
person")


I don't get many reports back, so presumably the voices are understandable. 
They are at least louder with the compact echo boxes. I did a long run with 
#12, and I'm still going through it.

The Eartquake voice; I was getting quake warnings last week, July 17th, then 
got this one, but there was a quake in Japan just days later.

Frank-S

_________________________________________________________________
http://im.live.com/messenger/im/home/?source=hmtextlinkjuly07
